d:
Or when they actually do heh...
Well I think with all these brats there's enough for a gallery of this type...

At first I was going to make it more focused on the twins but then I remembered that SKEB Marimo did with Malt so this is a more general gallery for Fuga related arts now.

I still haven't finished the second game and stil too poor to buy the third game, womp womp...

Jan 2026 Update: Yes, this is still going on! Let's hope importer-san is active this month for these pieces in better resolution.
